binding:binding.name: TA CMI Binding
binding:binding.description: The TA CMI binding integrates the C.M.I module from Technische Alternative. It allows to read analog and digital values using the TA CoE (CAN over Ethernet) protocol. There is also limited write support.
binding:binding.author: Timo Wendt, Wolfgang Klimt

parameter.name: cmiAddress
parameter.label: CMI IP address
parameter.description: IP address of the CMI module
